snippet: The drug has been approved by the Food and Drug Administration to treat relapses of a rare blood cancer called mantle cell lymphoma.
abstract: Food and Drug Administration approves new drug Imbruvica to treat relapses of a rare blood cancer called mantle cell lymphoma; makers are Pharmacyclics and Johnson & Johnson.
lead_paragraph: The drug has been approved by the Food and Drug Administration to treat relapses of a rare blood cancer called mantle cell lymphoma.

headline.main: Imbruvica, Drug to Treat Blood Cancer, Gains F.D.A. Approval
headline.print_headline: Drug to Treat Blood Cancer Gains F.D.A. Approval
